sen.e: In "Heike Monogatari" ("The Tale of the Heike"), it is described that, when Tomoyashu required Yoshinaka to suppress riotous behaviors by soldiers, he was bewildered by Yoshinaka's question, "Is the reason why you are called as Tsuzumi no Hogan that you have been hit or tapped by many person?" and he suggested the Cloistered Emperor to subjugate Yoshinaka.
